bio.name: This is Dominic Minischetti
bio.description: Born and raised in New York, Dom developed an ever-growing interest in computers at any early age. He's since lived in Florida, Michigan and now resides in California working for Williams-Sonoma, Inc. as a Front-end Engineer. Programming doesn't stop outside of work, where he finds himself becoming ever-proficient in the likes of React, Webpack and other modern web technologies. His interests reach beyond programming and into the depths of design, typography and animation. If he's not programming, you'll likely find him guitar in-hand, writing a new song with the dream of propelling himself to rockstar status.

professional.name: Williams Sonoma
professional.description: Bear witness to the adventures of a front-end engineer on an agile-driven team that creates and supports an expansive, multi-brand e-commerce platform! At the heart, we follow Dom as he collaborates with back-end and design teams to develop new initiatives utilizing core web technologies... but there's much more to this position than meets the eye! Tales of Java development, unit tests, SVN, Git and more hide within!

professional.name: Bisk
professional.description: Who would've thought he'd be designing and developing marketing initiatives for some of the nation's most well-respected universities? Or ensuring the invitations and table placeholders are print-ready and nothing short of perfect for the company's holiday party? Working so closely with print and illustrative experts is nothing short of inspiring, and some of that talent is eventually bound to rub off.

personal.name: Fortunes by Athena
personal.description: Do you play Overwatch? Perhaps... but has your fate been revealed? Fortunes by Athena is a magic 8-ball style performance prediction app based on the competitive shooter's cast of characters and fantastical abilities. Features feedback-based audio with the Web Audio API, CSS animations and a keyboard control scheme mimic the experience of using a desktop app.

personal.name: Metro for Steam
personal.description: Metro for Steam is a reimagination of Valve's Steam client and streamlines the original design to feature a cleaner, more functional user interface. With a community group of nearly 30,000 members and over 1,000,000 downloads, it's safe to say Metro has picked up quite a lot of steam (pun intended)!
